functions.name: kaplan_meier_central

databases.name: Database
databases.description: Database to use for the Kaplan-Meier curve

ui_visualizations.name: Survival time table
ui_visualizations.description: Surival time table for the cohort.

arguments.description: Task ID of the task that created the cohort in the database.
arguments.name: cohort_task_id

arguments.description: The cohort ID to use for the Kaplan-Meier curve.
arguments.name: shared_cohort_id

arguments.description: The column name of the time variable.
arguments.name: time_column_name

arguments.description: The column name of the censor.
arguments.name: censor_column_name

arguments.description: List of organizations to include in the analysis.
arguments.name: organizations_to_include

functions.description: Compute a Kaplan-Meier curves for a cohort of patients.
